price: 32. Ma caqliyadooda (xun) baa ku amra sidaa (inay kaa been sheegaan Nabiyow), ma aha ee waa qolo xadgudub badan.
arabic: أَمۡ تَأۡمُرُهُمۡ أَحۡلَٰمُهُم بِهَٰذَآۚ أَمۡ هُمۡ قَوۡمٞ طَاغُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: am tamuruhum aḥlāmuhum bihādhā am hum qawmun ṭāghūna
